trad.title: Colors
trad.text: A stroke of color, then some ink on top  ... zero planning!

digi.title: Digital Gallery
digi.text: Pixels, layers, and a bit of magic. Here live my weirdest creatures and experimental sketches!

proj.title: Books & Stories
proj.text: Here dwell curious foxes, rebellious hens, and gentle dragons, my self-published children's books, illustrated stories concepts, and playful art books. Handmade, heart-filled, and full of imagination!
